column5: Another politically themed thread eh Simon? You really have to get out and do some fishing.
I like it Simon, politically correct or not it tells a story..............
No kidding Blair, this weekeend going camping with the wife and kid...should get out in the boat a couple times at least.
Nice Simon.. here's something to add and latch another..  <iframe width="560" height="349" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/9pAC0YSmK0g" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Seems like he is o.k. with all the riots.  "You are like rats who crap in your nests."
that's a very angry and bitter man!
